title: The Breakfast Club Challenge with Shad Moss
itunes:title: The Breakfast Club Challenge with Shad Moss
description:
Shad Moss aka Bow Wow stopped by the Breakfast Club to discuss some of the big rumors and half truths that has followed the rapper for the past couple of years. He talks about the Bow Wow Challenge and the video where he was jumped backstage for allegedly talking trash about future. Yee blesses some listeners with some advice during "Ask Yee" and Charlamagne gives play by play commentator Brian Davis a lesson on what not to say during Donkey of the Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
